reviewText: No narrative. No background. Just a gory slideshow with some that cliche, whiny, graveyard music. Yes, while the pictures were gory and all, it was, for the most part, boring as HELL. And if you're a true gore hound like me, than you've already seen most of the pictures around the internet and stuff anywyas. A big yawn. Stick with Death Scenes or Traces of Death.
